Package com.tcs.controller

Class VehicleController

java.lang.Object
com.tcs.controller.VehicleController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/vehicle") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'UNDERWRITER\')") public class VehicleController extends Object
Controller for vehicle-related operations. Only users with the UNDERWRITER role can access these endpoints.

    • registerVehicle

      @PostMapping("/register") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> registerVehicle(@RequestBody VehicleRequest request, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Registers a new vehicle under the authenticated underwriter.
      Parameters:
      request - Vehicle data transfer object
      authentication - Authenticated user info (JWT-based)
      Returns:
      success message

    • viewMyVehicles

      @GetMapping("/view-my-vehicles") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Vehicle>> viewMyVehicles(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Returns all vehicles registered by the currently authenticated underwriter.
      Parameters:
      authentication - JWT-based authentication info
      Returns:
      list of vehicles

    • renewPolicy

      @PutMapping("/renew/{policyId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Vehicle> renewPolicy(@PathVariable Long policyId, @RequestParam String claimStatus, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Renews a policy for a vehicle if it belongs to the authenticated underwriter.
      Parameters:
      policyId - ID of the policy to renew
      claimStatus - New claim status for the renewal
      authentication - JWT authentication to extract underwriter username
      Returns:
      renewed vehicle object

    • updatePolicyType

      @PutMapping("/update-policy-type/{policyId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updatePolicyType(@PathVariable Long policyId, @RequestParam String newPolicyType, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Updates the policy type of a vehicle. Allowed only for policies owned by the underwriter.
      Parameters:
      policyId - ID of the vehicle policy to update
      newPolicyType - New policy type value
      authentication - JWT authentication to verify ownership
      Returns:
      success message

    • getAllVehicles

      @GetMapping("/get-all-vehicles") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Vehicle>> getAllVehicles()
      Fetches all registered vehicles across all underwriters. Can be used for debugging or admin views.
      Returns:
      list of all vehicles

    • getVehicleById

      @GetMapping("/{policyId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Vehicle> getVehicleById(@PathVariable Long policyId)
      Retrieves a specific vehicle policy by its ID.
      Parameters:
      policyId - Policy ID
      Returns:
      Vehicle object
